Desc.entry: Place of Christian worship and community activities which include Brownies, Guides and Rainbows, junior club, Mumbies, Nethergreen Nippers and womens fellowship.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Services at 9.30am (informal caf√© style service for all ages) & 11am (traditional worship), 4th Sun in the month at 6.30pm, Mon at 9.30am & 2pm (JoJo's songtime for babies and toddlers, please contact for details of other sessions), 6.30-8pm (junior club aged 7-11 years), 7.30-9pm (Boys' Brigade), Tues 10.30am-12noon (Mumbies), Tues 2-3pm (women's fellowship), Tues pm (Rainbows, Brownies and Guides), Wed at 12.30pm (lunch club, see separate entry), Wed 7-9pm (club for 11-14 years)
